sentences.sContent: a monumental contribution to the field of medicine
sentences.sCn: 对医学领域的重大贡献

sentences.sContent: Charles Darwin’s monumental study, ‘The Origin of Species’
sentences.sCn: 查尔斯•达尔文的不朽著作《物种起源》

synos.tran: 不朽的；纪念碑的；非常的

words.tran: 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品

trans.tranOther: a monumental achievement, piece of work etc is very important and is usually based on many years of work
